name: Emily Liu
physical_description: Artistic, Graceful, Expressive, Often seen with paint-splattered clothes, vibrant with energy, possessing a creative aura that reflects her passion for art.
personality: Creative, Kind, Passionate, Vibrant, Energetic, Thoughtful
role: Emily brings a radiant and lively energy into her marriage with Jackson, their shared appreciation for art and nature forming the core of their bond, complementing Jackson's musical talents with her vivid visual expressions.
